segments.text: I feel so bad for the woman, she's completely unaware of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she's just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing her like this, so focused on one thing and missing everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would look up and see what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause so much damage, and she's just standing in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel really sorry for her, she seems so overwhelmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone helps her soon, before things get even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's really sad to see her in this situation, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to give her a hug and tell her everything is going to be okay.
segments.speaker: PAR
